item.title: 捷豹路虎表示工厂将继续关闭至十月
item.description: 捷豹路虎汽车公司（Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc）再次延长了停产时间，因为导致该汽车制造商瘫痪的网络攻击仍在继续。【原文：Jaguar Land Rover Automotive Plc extended its production shutdown yet again as the cyberattack that’s crippled the carmaker persists.】

item.title: 卢比创历史新低，美国签证费上涨加剧关税困境
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统出人意料地提高签证费，加剧了人们对美国惩罚性关税的担忧，印度卢比跌至新纪录。【原文：The Indian rupee fell to a fresh record after President Donald Trump’s surprise hike in visa fees added to worries over punitive US tariffs.】

item.title: Kingspan 计划在阿姆斯特丹为数据中心材料部门进行首次公开募股
item.description: 随着数据中心基础设施支出的增加，建材公司 Kingspan Group Plc 正在考虑对其先进建筑系统部门 Advnsys 进行首次公开募股。【原文：Building materials firm Kingspan Group Plc is considering an initial public offering of its advanced building systems unit Advnsys, as spending on data center infrastructure ramps up.】

item.title: 瑞典降息至三年低点，释放结束宽松政策信号
item.description: 瑞典央行今年第三次降息，并表示预计目前将保持借贷成本稳定，以促进经济复苏。【原文：Sweden’s central bank delivered its third interest-rate cut this year and said it expects to hold borrowing costs steady for now to bolster a recovering economy.】

item.title: 德国服务业私营部门实现 16 个月来最快增长
item.description: 由于服务业的复苏弥补了制造业的再次下滑，9 月份德国私营部门的活动以 16 个月来最快的速度增长。【原文：German private-sector activity rose at the fastest pace in 16 months in September as a resurgence in the services sector more than made up for another slide by manufacturers.】

item.title: 万科放弃在岸私募债利息，寻求更低利率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科集团正在与国内主要债权人谈判，以降低价值数百亿元人民币的私人债务的借贷成本，因为这家陷入困境的开发商正寻求缓解流动性压力。【原文：China Vanke Co. is in talks with major domestic creditors to cut borrowing costs on private debt worth tens of billions of yuan, as the embattled developer seeks to ease liquidity stress, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 政治混乱导致法国私营部门下滑幅度超出预期
item.description: 随着法国陷入新一轮政治动荡，法国私营部门活动降至五个月来最弱水平。【原文：French private-sector activity fell to the weakest level in five months as the country grappled with a fresh bout of political turmoil.】

item.title: 尼日利亚金融科技公司瞄准美国市场，关注非洲移民社群
item.description: 尼日利亚一家金融科技公司正在与一家美国银行合作，使客户能够通过一个数字钱包连接他们在两国的银行账户。【原文：A Nigerian fintech firm is partnering with a US bank to enable customers to link their bank accounts in both countries via a single digital wallet.】

item.title: 印尼军方宣传其在普拉博沃领导下发挥更广泛的作用
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的政府明确表示，武装部队在推进其经济政策方面发挥着越来越重要的作用，而不仅仅是为了保卫国家。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto’s government is making it clear the armed forces are increasingly playing a role in advancing his economic policies - and not there just for the country’s defense.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气交易商已开始押注明年夏季价格上涨
item.description: 对欧洲天然气合同的大量押注表明，即使明年将有更多的天然气供应，一些交易商也已经开始为下一个囤积季节进行套期保值。【原文：A flurry of bets on European natural gas contracts is signaling some traders have already started hedging for the next stockpiling season even with more supplies set to come online next year.】

item.title: 芯片需求令人失望，ASM 国际公司下调前景展望
item.description: ASM International NV 下调了对下半年收入的展望，理由是这家半导体设备制造商的一些客户的需求低于预期。【原文：ASM International NV cut its outlook for second-half revenue, citing lower-than-anticipated demand from some of the semiconductor equipment maker’s clients.】

item.title: 尼日利亚有望成为非洲四大经济体中最后一个降低利率的国家
item.description: 由于通胀放缓，尼日利亚中央银行将在科维德-19疫情后首次降息，成为非洲四大经济体中最后一个开始放松货币政策的国家。【原文：The Central Bank of Nigeria is set to deliver its first interest-rate cut since the Covid-19 pandemic because of slowing inflation, making it the last of Africa’s four biggest economies to start easing monetary policy.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳总统表示，博茨瓦纳希望在下个月之前购买德比尔斯公司的控股权
item.description: 博茨瓦纳总统的目标是在下月底之前完成收购戴比尔斯公司多数股权的交易，尽管他的政府和其他潜在买家仍在继续与该钻石公司的控股股东进行谈判。【原文：Botswana’s president aims to complete a deal to take a majority stake in De Beers by the end of next month, even as his administration and other potential buyers continue negotiations with the diamond company’s controlling shareholder.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将上涨，英镑保持稳定
方位点公司的模拟公司漂洋过海运输金属
item.description:
Squarepoint正在将数据驱动战略与传统的金属交易相结合，与嘉能可和特拉菲古拉展开竞争。【原文：

Squarepoint is combining data-driven strategies with old-fashioned metals trading to compete with Glencore and Trafigura.

】

item.title: 华为计划用三年时间在人工智能芯片领域超越英伟达
item.description: 华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd.）公开承认，其芯片在原始功率和速度方面无法与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.因此，中国的国家冠军正在依靠自己的传统优势：蛮力、网络和政策支持来实现同样的冲击力。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. openly admits its silicon can’t match Nvidia Corp.’s in raw power and speed. So to pack the same punch, China’s national champion is counting on its traditional strengths: brute force, networking, and policy support.】

item.title: 印度 9 月经济活动放缓，最新采购经理人指数显示
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一项即时调查显示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的50%关税生效后，印度9月份的经济活动有所放缓。【原文：India’s economic activity slowed in September, after US President Donald Trump’s 50% tariffs took effect, a flash survey by HSBC Holdings Plc showed.】

item.title: 新加坡核心消费价格指数连续第二个月放缓
item.description: 新加坡 8 月份的主要消费价格指数连续第二个月放缓。【原文：Singapore’s key consumer price index in August slowed for a second month in a row.】

item.title: 日本高市称发行更多债券或不可避免
item.description: 执政党自民党领导层竞选的领跑者佐佐江-高市（Sanae Takaichi）表示，日本将需要依靠超额税收来抵御消费价格的上涨，但 "如果形势需要，发行政府债券可能变得不可避免"。【原文：Japan will need to rely on excess tax revenue to fight back against rising consumer prices, but issuing government bonds “could become unavoidable if the situation calls for it,” said Sanae Takaichi, a frontrunner in the ruling Liberal Democratic Party’s leadership race.】

item.title: 豆油暴跌，棕榈油跌至六周低点
item.description: 由于阿根廷暂时取消了对所有作物货物征收的出口关税，竞争对手豆油的价格下滑，棕榈油创下了 3 月份以来的最大单日跌幅。【原文：Palm oil headed for its biggest one-day drop since March as prices of rival soybean oil slipped after Argentina temporarily scrapped export tariffs on all of its crop cargoes.】

item.title: 迪拜高达 3.81 亿美元的 ALEC 承包商首次公开募股售罄
item.description: 迪拜在 ALEC Engineering & Contracting LLC 公司高达 3.81 亿美元的首次公开募股中，所有发售股份均受到追捧，这标志着该酋长国最新推动的资产私有化，并利用了中东地区的建筑热潮。【原文：Dubai had demand for all shares on offer in an up to $381 million initial public offering of ALEC Engineering & Contracting LLC, marking the emirate’s latest push to privatize assets and capitalize on a construction boom in the Middle East.】

item.title: 桑托斯、壳牌、伍德赛德表示支持澳大利亚国内天然气储备
item.description: 澳大利亚能源部门基本上支持出台一项政策，要求生产商为国内消费保留一部分天然气，因为该国正寻求在迫在眉睫的本地供应紧张与利润丰厚的出口之间取得平衡。【原文：Australia’s energy sector largely supports the introduction of a policy that would require producers to reserve a portion of gas for domestic consumption, as the nation seeks to balance a looming local supply crunch with lucrative exports.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂面临酸价下跌压力
item.description: 据中国一家咨询公司称，由于一种主要的赚钱副产品价格下跌，中国铜业可能面临压力，从而可能导致开工率下降。【原文：China’s copper industry could face pressure due to the decline in the price of a key moneymaking byproduct, potentially leading to a drop in operating rates, according to a Chinese consultancy.】

item.title: Numis 民意调查显示英国董事会受外国股票上市诱惑
item.description: 在最近的一项民意调查中，绝大多数在伦敦上市的公司在去年都考虑过在海外增设上市地或转移现有上市地，其中阿姆斯特丹成为最受欢迎的选择。【原文：A large majority of London-listed companies in a recent poll have considered adding a listing overseas or moving their existing one in the last year, with Amsterdam emerging as the most popular alternative.】

item.title: 东欧鹰派推动福林和库鲁纳的世界性涨势
item.description: 今年以来，匈牙利和捷克共和国的鹰派央行行长帮助这两个国家的货币在全球范围内名列前茅，越来越多的投资者认为这种收益将持续下去。【原文：Hawkish central bankers in Hungary and the Czech Republic have helped put their currencies at the top of the pack globally this year and a growing cohort of investors say the gains will continue.】

item.title: 伦敦写字楼紧俏 吸引澳大利亚基金投资 2,000 亿澳元
item.description: 随着全球投资者重返伦敦，澳大利亚的一家顶级养老基金正在加倍投资欧洲房地产，并将目光锁定在伦敦的写字楼上。【原文：One of Australia’s top pension funds is doubling down on European real estate, zeroing in on London offices as global investors come back to the city.】

item.title: 皮凯蒂称 2% 的财富税是法国的 "绝对最低税率
item.description: 托马斯-皮凯蒂（Thomas Piketty）说，作为法国预算骚动的中心，征收 2% 财富税的提议是必要的，但不足以应对该国的财政挑战。【原文：Thomas Piketty said a proposal for a 2% wealth tax at the center of France’s budget uproar is necessary but insufficient to address the country’s fiscal challenges.】

item.title: 沃尔玛支持的 Flipkart 向金融科技公司 Supermoney 投资 3000 万美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沃尔玛公司支持的 Flipkart India Pvt.【原文：Flipkart India Pvt., backed by Walmart Inc., is investing $30 million in its fintech unit Supermoney as the e-commerce giant accelerates its push into lending and stock broking, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港贷款银行家赶在台风来临前获得签名
item.description: 香港即将来临的台风突显了全球金融中心的一些地区，尽管技术上十分先进，但开展业务仍然依赖于实物签名。【原文：The approaching typhoon in Hong Kong highlights how pockets of the global financial hub, for all its technological swagger, still depend on physical signatures to conduct business.】

item.title: 泰国新政府计划在投票前采取刺激措施和泰铢行动
item.description: 泰国总理阿努丁-占维拉库（Anutin Charnvirakul）的新政府将公布短期经济刺激计划，以刺激消费并帮助那些在沉重债务下挣扎的人们，争取在未来四个月的执政中扩大支持率。【原文：Thai Prime Minister Anutin Charnvirakul’s new government will unveil plans for short-term economic stimulus to boost consumption and help those struggling with heavy debt, racing to broaden support in its next four months in power.】
